title: Understanding Data Inventory Challenges
text: Data inventory involves more than just regulations. Consider other factors that might make it challenging.

title: Factors Affecting Data Inventory
text: Complexity of data systems, data volume, data variety, and organizational processes can make data inventory challenging.

title: Regulations and Data Inventory
text: While regulations play a role, they are not the sole reason for the challenges in data inventory.

title: True or False: Data Inventory Challenges
text: Is it true that data inventory is challenging purely because of regulations?
